# SNAKE-fMRI Documentation 

::::{grid}
:reverse:
:gutter: 2 1 1 1

:::{grid-item}
:columns: 8
:class: sd-fs-3
**SNAKE-fMRI is an open-source Python package for simulating fMRI data, from brain activation to Kspace acquisition.**
:::

::::
